name: Chains Of Morr
description:
Chains Of Morr is a free 10 min turn based board game for 2 or 3 players made in Figma.


For help and more info please join our discord room https://discord.gg/ybsKua6XVM


Players move units through the castle while playing cards to gain advantage. Unique card chain mechanic allows for very unpredictable combos and game outcomes.


Feel free to give it a try!

∙ 13 unique cards

∙ Game takes 10 min

∙ Very easy to learn
